title: Suki De Suki De, Daisuki De
alternative_title: 好きで好きで、大好きで ; 好喜歡好喜歡、最喜歡你了！
status: 好きで好きで、大好きで ; 好喜歡好喜歡、最喜歡你了！
description:
Description :
        Iori, a student, has been devoted to “Ha-kun” since a young age. He is a close friend of his older brother who is five years older than him, and now Ha-kun is extremely busy as an entertainer. He ‘s a bit mean, but is beautiful, kind, and experienced… Every time Iori confesses, he is successfully dodged, but just being able to meet Ha-kun makes me happy! One day, Iori receives a graduation gift from Ha-kun…? “If you’re defenseless like that, I’ll attack you…” The sweet and pure love of a poor student and an older beauty who is good at seducing (?)!
